issue.title: dependency issues when installing from source

content.raw:
2. I got  the conflict by installing all the dependencies, how you just explained, `libogre-1.8-dev` and `libcegui-mk2-0.7.6`, and it does not complain when doing this, the error appears on runtime. 

So if I want to install cegui as well I should use the `libogre-dev` dependency. Got it :)
content.html:
1. I got the conflict by installing all the dependencies, how you just explained, libogre-1.8-dev and libcegui-mk2-0.7.6, and it does not complain when doing this, the error appears on runtime.

So if I want to install cegui as well I should use the libogre-dev dependency. Got it :)
